Get census tract geographic boundaries

Source: R/tract.R
s2_tracts.Rd

Get census tract geographic boundaries

Usage

s2_tracts(state, year)

Arguments

state

character string of state number or abbreviation

year

numeric data year passed to tigris to get tract boundaries

Value

a tibble of tracts with a s2_geography column

Examples

s2_tracts("OH", 2022)
#> # A tibble: 3,168 × 13
#>    STATEFP COUNTYFP TRACTCE GEOID    NAME  NAMELSAD MTFCC FUNCSTAT  ALAND AWATER
